img_above_text:
![Wukong BlackLoong 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/21/Wukong_BlackLoong_8.jpg)
Sometimes he’ll end the two sweeping electrical swings by finally bringing both weapons together in front of him, and create a shockwave with an expanding electrical ring as they connect that you’ll need to dodge or jump over — or even rise up on your Pillar Stance to retaliate with a heavy attack as it passes under you.
img_below_text:
Another lengthy combo that can be hard to get away from will be when Black Loong starts to repeatedly pound the ground with alternate weapon slams, expelling electric blasts from each one. This can go on for up to nine slams, with the final attack being the one that causes the biggest explosion. If you try to interrupt him with Immobilize, be sure to follow up with a strong attack that can stagger, or he’ll simply keep the combo going.
![Wukong BlackLoong 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1a/Wukong_BlackLoong_5.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong BlackLoong 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/21/Wukong_BlackLoong_8.jpg)
Sometimes he’ll end the two sweeping electrical swings by finally bringing both weapons together in front of him, and create a shockwave with an expanding electrical ring as they connect that you’ll need to dodge or jump over — or even rise up on your Pillar Stance to retaliate with a heavy attack as it passes under you."
        - Following Text: "Another lengthy combo that can be hard to get away from will be when Black Loong starts to repeatedly pound the ground with alternate weapon slams, expelling electric blasts from each one. This can go on for up to nine slams, with the final attack being the one that causes the biggest explosion. If you try to interrupt him with Immobilize, be sure to follow up with a strong attack that can stagger, or he’ll simply keep the combo going.
![Wukong BlackLoong 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1a/Wukong_BlackLoong_5.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a battle scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring the protagonist Wukong facing off against the formidable enemy Black Loong. Black Loong is shown in the midst of executing powerful electrical attacks with dual weapons, creating shockwaves and electric blasts that the player must dodge or counter. The image captures the intensity of the combat, highlighting the need for strategic maneuvering and timing to overcome Black Loong's lengthy attack combos.
